remark.en: Course level: zero to basic. Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade. The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
remark.ch: 限華語程度為初級之外籍生。一、第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。二、前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en: On successful completion of this course, students will be able to 1. build up the ability of expressing the basic Chinese, for example, self-introduction, greetings, and asking price etc.; 2. understand the dialogues based on text structure; 3. recognize basic characters and realize the general structure of Chinese language.
goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應能 1. 建立基本中文表達能力，如自我介紹、打招呼、詢價等； 2. 聽懂以課文架構為基礎的基本對話； 3. 認識基礎漢字並理解中文語言的基本結構。

content.en: Basic life Chinese topics on self-introduction, greetings, and shopping etc. The exercise and grading focus on class oral performance. Students are strictly required the preview on text listening and the review performance.
content.ch: 生活方面的基礎華語：自我介紹、打招呼、購物等。著重於課堂練習與學生口語表現，嚴格要求課前聽力預習與課後口語複習。
